p: La Niña and neutral years were evinced at the end of 2007 and 2010 and in January–February of 2001 and 2012 when there were negative anomalies (Figure 5A). Also, similar negative anomalies were seen in January–March of 2006, 2009, 2014 and 2017 (Figure 5B). On the other hand, the highest positive anomalies characterized the El Niño of 2015–2016 (Figure 5B).
